item.description:
Join us for a fun day at Mount Sunapee in southern New Hampshire which is only 1.5 hours away from Boston. This is a great chance to check out the other meetup folks, make some new ski buddies, and enjoy a great day of skiing/riding.

Discounted ticket can be purchased for $45 via the following site:
http://www.skicbsport...

Ticket orders need to be paid in advance by Thursday 1/13 3PM and can be pick up at the Group Sales Window outside Spruce Lodge (not the Sunapee Lodge) on Sunday.

We will meet by the Group Sales Window at Spruce Lodge at 9:45AM for a quick meet and greet and then hit the slopes. If you arrive late and are unable to find us on the slopes, we plan to have lunch at Spruce Lodge at 1pm. I will email my cell phone number on Friday to those who rsvp'ed. If you sign up late, please contact me directly.

Lesson package is available at Mt. Sunapee for those who are interested. All levels are welcome. Please indicate your level of skier or snowboarder that you are in your RSVP.

http://www.mountsunap...

Carpools suggested - transportation is your own responsibility. Due to the long drive, we recommend that people carpool. If you need a ride or can provide a ride, please note that in your RSVP and we will try to arrange carpools as best as we can. Suggested carpool fee $8 to pay for gas and tolls paid directly to the driver.

Looking forward to hitting the slopes with you!
item.how_to_find_us: Please meet by the Group Sales Window @ Spruce Lodge

group.name: The Greater Boston Asian Professionals Meetup Group

item.name: Ski/Ride at Mt. Sunapee
